title: Tie, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Unfolded material for a tie with tan and white crackle design on dark blue ground. Design shows horizontal rows of various geometric and floral patterns with large design of dark and light blue-petaled flowers, dark blue leaves with tan and white pattern, and thick dark blue vine all on top of horizontal pattern throughout piece. Also features one large bird.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tie, mid-20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1955-115-1.
